# The zip extension

Configure the `zip` extension.

This extension provides support for reading and writing ZIP compressed archives.

## PHP_EXT_ZIP

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Enable the extension.

## PHP_EXT_ZIP_SHARED

* Default: `OFF`
* Values: `ON|OFF`

Build extension as shared.
